title: Stencil, "Kata-gami: Japanese Characters", 1780–1830
medium: Mulberry paper, lacquer made from persimmon juice
description: Long rectangular sheet made of multiple layers of mulberry paper with series of Japanese characters cut out, leaving a largely solid ground.  Characters are scattered throughout.

tombstone.epitaph: Stencil, "Kata-gami: Japanese Characters", 1780–1830.Mulberry paper, lacquer made from persimmon juice. 1948-128-12.
